website_summaries.verdict: Youth-size basketball with a lighter weight that's great for beginners.
pros: Made specifically for children's play, ages 8 and less
Lighter weight than other youth size basketballs makes it a good ball for learning to shoot
Can be used either indoors or outdoors
Cover uses multiple colors, which kids are sure to love
cons: Color coatings may peel off the ball after multiple uses

website_summaries.verdict: Designed for kids ages 8 and under, this lightweight ball helps kids learn to shoot and rebound more easily.
pros: Lets young children learn basketball fundamentals with less risk of injury
Designed for kids ages 8 and under
Helps kids learn to shoot and rebound more easily
Weighs 25% less than standard youth-sized balls
cons: The lightweight design of this ball can make dribbling more challenging

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bounce well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking ball and pretty light, but it is made of some Weird synthetic material that has decent grip but doesn't bounce naturally. My 5 year old noticed right away. I even pumped it to make it bounce but now it's hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: USC Trojan

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The colored panels on the ball have already started peeling off. Haven't had it two months and have only used it 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Ryandengland

customer_reviews.title: since it was recommended for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: I got this ball for my 10 year old daughter, since it was recommended for smaller hands. She didn't care much for it and uses the regulation sized ball we have. I, however, enjoy being able to palm this ball and produce some showtime dunks in my driveway. Of course, the hoop has been lowered to the lowest setting for...um... my daughter. Yeah. At any rate, it's a good, solid ball.
customer_reviews.author: Marty McDonald

customer_reviews.title: 6 y.o. nephew's favorite ball
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a high-end basketball, and is very enjoyable to use. Anytime my nephew goes to basketball practice, his teammates, coaches, and just about everyone that has a chance to come into contact with it just feels the urge to use it. Unfortunately, it comes to the point where sometimes kids or coaches will use it too much and bring out your kids possessive side, becoming unwilling to share... but that's a consequence of just having a great ball that's sought after. It's hard to describe a product that just begs to be used. It's the nicest kids basketball I've seen, at least. Hopefully your little one can share.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bounce for the ounce
customer_reviews.text: Not as grippy as it should be for small children and the bounce is rather flat to say the least (possibly because of how light it is). I'm a lifelong basketball player, including college, and while I like the idea of a "rookie" ball for my kids to play with, it doesn't live up to my expectations as far as quality. A basketball should bounce correctly, including a direct line back to your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffro

customer_reviews.title: Starter Ball for Youth (Pre-Kinder to First)
customer_reviews.text: This ball has a specific purpose. It’s durable as long as you keep it stored indoors. This ball is lighter and smaller which is intended for youth play typically in Pre-Kinder to First Grade (4 to 6 yr olds). This ball is to encourage the children towards basketball and build their confidence in ball-handling and to make a basket on an 8 foot rim. Check with your youth basketball organizations on the standards ball sizes and rim heights. Our league moves to from Size 7 (Pre-K to First), Size 8 (2nd to Fourth) and Size 9 / Adult Men (5th grade +). This applies to boys. Girls will stay with the Size 8 ball. Your local youth league may vary.
customer_reviews.author: B Plus Plus

customer_reviews.title: Light weight is a plus for small kids
customer_reviews.text: As others have reported the bounce was a little “off” (did not seem to come straight back) and also “dead” initially even with the right amount of air. (Which is why I removed one star.) However, after inflating the ball twice (had lost some air overnight) and using it a few times the bounce was sorted and the ball works as expected. Small kids have a noticeably easier time getting this lighter ball to the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball. I originally bought the brown basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great Basketball. I originally bought the brown basketball, but bought the rainbow colored ball for my daughter to use at basketball practice. It is easy to find as everyone has a brown ball. The ball was great for the first season, held up well. Pumped air in the ball for start of 2nd season and still works great! We kept this ball indoors and that was good because the brown ball was stored in the garage and doesn't quite work as well for the 2nd season. Highly recommend this ball as a parent, former player and coach. Store ball out of elements and should be fine to use for several years.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Some will love and others will not.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love this product but some might. The ball is very light. In my opinion it is awkwardly light, but that might be a good things for little kids. The ball feels expensive which is great. Leather 27.5 ball for around $20 is great. My big complaint is that it does not bounce well. I feel that is because of the lightweight technology. My son plays with another ball because he personally prefers a better bounce. Again some people may love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Betances

customer_reviews.title: Does not bounce well
customer_reviews.text: Well it's colorful and looks pretty but that doesn't really matter when it doesn't bounce much:( this is not rubber, it's some other synthetic material and that definitely changes the way it dribbles. We tried inflatting it more but it didn't help. You have to use a lot of force and even then it loses momentum quickly. We had gotten a smaller ball to help my son develop his skills since he is young but this has made everything WORSE. He won't use it because it's so hard for him to dribble. Total waste of money:(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter.  Quality ball.
customer_reviews.text: 27.5" Quality Ball. Nice composite cover. Lighter weight & smaller size will make big difference in our 5yo being able to maneuver the ball appropriately. Very obvious weight difference when you hold with a girls' 28.5" Spalding Composite (Our 7yo daughter is much, much stronger than normal kid so we went ahead and got the "game" size lighter weight ball). If you're looking for a ball for a smaller kid to learn with then this is a great ball. Forego the heavy rubber balls whose only benefit is durability. Younger daughter loves the colors, too!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: ball had a hole in it when it arrived, customer service will not help.
customer_reviews.text: Well my son loved this ball so much he wanted to do a video review (1st one ever). The ball has wonderful grip, and is light enough for the kiddos. Ball arrived with a pin hole somewhere as I have had to pump it up everyday for my son to use it. I reached out to Spalding and they never even responded to me so I reached out again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reichel

customer_reviews.title: Defective.  Company offered no resolution.
customer_reviews.text: The basketball came on time but had a puncture in it and kept deflating. I emailed and haven’t heard back with a resolution. I feel like at least an email from the company to offer a resolution would have been nice. Also adding that when I reached out to the company for help it directed me to the manufacturer, so don't expect help from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a women's ball!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was a smaller ball than a women's size. Where I come from, "rookie" leagues play with a women's ball, not a tiny ball like this. So I expected a women's size ball. I didn't know a 27.5 ball is not a women's size. I'm very disappointed I spent $23 on this ball. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: MSR

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball For Kids Learning To Play
customer_reviews.text: This ball is perfect for kids under 10 or 11 years old. It's smaller than a regulation size woman's basketball. My nine-year-old daughter had trouble with regulation size balls because they were too heavy and she couldn't reach the hoop. she was not only getting frustrated but losing interest. Once she started using the Spalding rookie gear smaller ball she was able to reach the basket and started having fun playing the game
customer_reviews.author: JPB

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice with all the colors but it doesn’t bounce that high, even when it’s full.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not a springy ball doesn’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay inflated well. Has no bounce I would definitely know we play with about 10 of these exact same balls at my kids practice those are great!!! They work well!! JUST MY LUCK .....this one i own isn’t as springy no matter how much i fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Shell, Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! The color and quality of Spalding balls are amazing. I purchased this for my toddler son. This ball is a bit smaller than the regular size. But still way bigger than a toddler ball. The neighborhood kids saw him with it and became the topic of conversation fast! Would recommend !
customer_reviews.author: One big family

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for younger kids. My 7 and 4 year olds can both make this into an 8 foot tall goal. It has a nice grip to it. It is fairly durable but does show some scuffs. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Old version is better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we had the same one (or so I thought). The weight and size are great for younger players (4 - 7 year old, depending on their strength and ability). The older ball is much better, softer and gentler to the touch. My son refuses to use the new ball because it is not as good. This was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Ward

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, durable b-ball for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year olds b-ball team. Colors make it super easy to find and not mix up with other kids. Very durable and holds air well. Great for indoor and outdoor. Grip is good but not the best compared to other leather composites out there. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jamian Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come inflated enough to use
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a decent quality ball- perhaps a bit over priced. My big complaint was that it said the ball would come inflated. Well, it came inflated but not enough to bounce! It was very disappointing as it was gift so I had to rush to a sporting goods store to get it inflated. That’s where I realized I could have spent $14 instead of $20. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight ball for kids
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter was so sad when she wore a hole in her old basketball because it was the only one she had been able to shoot well due to it being lightweight. This ball was a perfect replacement and she was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Biggly

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old Grandson. It was the perfect size for him,light not so heavy like the standard ball. I would buy it again just to have another one for when he comes to my house.Great price for a Spalding.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene schissler

customer_reviews.title: Its colorful
customer_reviews.text: Good ball, has a decent grip/tack to it, but it has a strange bounce to it. Its almost as if the rubber casing is too stiff. However, it plays fine and the little man is very fond of it. Overall, I am pleased with my purchase and would likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not regular size. It is smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball. But I was a little disappointed with the size. I didn't pay good attention to the specifics and I think it is meant for younger children. Not what I wanted for my son to practice with for his basketball team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball for Youngsters
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball for my 6 year old to learn how to develop skills. It is lighter than other balls, and it gives him more confidence when shooting and dribbling. I would recommend for children 4-8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson P.

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball size with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball size with the kids. Kids love it and can shoot it easier.. Feels a little smaller but not too small that it’s fine for an adult playing with kids too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Dad

customer_reviews.title: Get them outside
customer_reviews.text: a gift for a four year old who is starting to play basketball for parks and rec. we practice in the backyard. He loved it and especially the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Connie E. Ford

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old Boy loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and my son does too I was anticipating it being bigger but he has no complaints and it has been used at practice by multiple kids age 5-7 sturdy
customer_reviews.author: PureRomance by Taya

customer_reviews.title: Well spent money, if looking for a kids basketball
customer_reviews.text: Light, good grip, smaller then pro ball, love the color, came air ready to play. Bought for 6 yr old grandson. He likes it, thats what counts the most. Very well made, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Good product for small kid, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for small kid just learning. My 4 year old daughter was able to begin to learn with this. I expect it will be good for a few years. Fun colors she likes it. Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 4 year old who is just learning to dribble. This is the “league standard” size ball for our local Little Dribblers. It seems perfect for his age, it was exactly what we expected and just like the ones others we know have purchased in the store. It came completely aired up.
customer_reviews.author: Jake M.

customer_reviews.title: A decent ball, but didn't bounce as well as some others the other kids were using.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old son for his first year at basketball. Good looking ball, but didn't seem to bounce as well as many of the balls the other boys were using. I probably wouldn't purchase this again. I did check pressure and it seemed fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball good company
customer_reviews.text: I gave a five stars because this company’s customer service is really good. The first one I got was leaked. I email them and got the second one right the way. The basketball is also very good. My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Keeps going flat. Returned
customer_reviews.text: The one sent keeps losing air. By the next morning it is flat again. Only had it a few weeks. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: As I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it today and it's what I expected. Good buy so far in this short time of using it for first practise.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania Paun Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and convenient to buy on Amaazon
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for a 4 year old learning. Unfortunately we have already left it at a practice/game. Not sure if i'll get it back, but I sure hope so!
customer_reviews.author: mortgagemescott

customer_reviews.title: This is a great youth basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Great color on this basketball. It is good for smaller hands and our grandson loves it. He is 4 years old but is tall for his age.
customer_reviews.author: Marshop

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: super cute and fun!! i ordered rainbow striped socks for the kids team too. they were darling
customer_reviews.author: 3in2yrs

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Not a ton to say here other than that it was exactly as expected and a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Phil Segal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size (w/ photo) and weight
customer_reviews.text: Check out my photo to get a sense about the size. Perfect for my 9-yr old boy and it’s indeed lighter. Good initial quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Niel Y.

customer_reviews.title: superb colorful kids basketball
customer_reviews.text: Grand-kids play with this ball everyday and love it's ease and responsiveness. Maintains it's air pressure too.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Van Veen

customer_reviews.title: UPC code imprinted on its face
customer_reviews.text: This basketball came with a giant UPC code permanently imprinted on its face. It's ugly this way, and you can feel it while bouncing the ball. Awful design considering the UPC is also imprinted on the cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: R. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap basketball
customer_reviews.text: My son lost his old basketball. I bought this one. It feels good in hands. Don’t buy an expensive basketball because kids lose it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barclays

customer_reviews.title: It broke in 6 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, It looks great. I liked the color. My 5 yr old just started his basketball class. Once a week. 1hr/wk. No extra practice. However just after 6 weeks, so literally less than 10 times use. It starts to leak...
customer_reviews.author: BunnyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect youth basketball!
customer_reviews.text: Durable indoor outdoor ball with good grip. Regulation youth sized. It's better than the one I bought in the sports shop!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Dunn Jr

customer_reviews.title: fits our needs
customer_reviews.text: This worked out perfectly in my school's outdoor recess area! The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mathtchrj

customer_reviews.title: Not very bouncy
customer_reviews.text: This ball doesn't have much spring when you bounce it. It constantly feels flat but no amount of air allows it to have a good rebound on the bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball for my son who is 7 years old and just starting to play some organized basketball. It's on the lighter side which will help with his form, shooting and getting some confidence. Highly recommended for a child just starting to play.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my five year old son who is obsessed with basketball. After researching several balls I decided on this one and I'm so happy I did. It's the perfect size and weight for him. Not he can perfect his shots the technique before moving on to a full weight ball. This was a great purchase and I highly recommend for any child who loves the sport.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Allen

customer_reviews.title: defect in ball
customer_reviews.text: the ball has a slight wrinkle in the ball which makes it bounce to one side
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball for youth
customer_reviews.text: High quality, lightweight basketball. Great for young children, just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight, starter ball for younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is definitely lighter in weight compare to the SPALDING NBA ball. My 3 years old toddler loves it and it's easier for her to pick it up and throw it. Its very colorful and easy to spot at the playground and the size seems just right. I prefer it heavier though.
customer_reviews.author: P. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second of these. The first one (rainbow version) lasted about 5 years of hard play. These feel great and are VERY light. Makes learning the proper technique easier for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Role

customer_reviews.title: not the size advertised
customer_reviews.text: the review said for 12 year old girls and this is not the case. The basket ball even says a younger age on it when you get it. This would be good for 9 year old girls
customer_reviews.author: gary slates

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good basketball for my son who is 6 and for my so. Who is 8
customer_reviews.author: David Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids 5 to 8 - beginners. My son likes the colors and the texture of this basketball
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for youth league basketball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 9 year ild daughter to practice with. Same size as the ones they use in her basketball league.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: why is it not weighted properly vs other balls at this size?
customer_reviews.author: My Review for you.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: It gets a lot of use here and is a favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne H

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 1st basketball. 5 year old started playing basketball and this is the perfect size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ball for my grandson who is in first grade. Looked everywhere for this size locally and couldn’t find any.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball several months back for my little ball player and fully inflated the ball doesn’t bounce, never has. It is awful trying to teach a young player to dribble with a ball with no bounce. We ended up going to target to get a ball of any use. Terrible product, don’t waste your $$!!! I wish I had sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went flat in the first week
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty straight forward: we bought this basketball and within 24 hours, the ball begins to go flat. It is pain having to pump it up every time the kids want to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Average American consumer of dignified taste

customer_reviews.title: Good for both kids and parents
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good ball for small kids. I can play together with my 6 year old son and he can easily handle the ball on a normal basketball field as it is light and small. But not too small or too light so that even a small wind affects the throw. I also enjoy the games with it!
customer_reviews.author: Balint

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 and 7 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who has played with this ball remarks how nice it is. It's not super hard, but feels high quality and like a REAL basketball. Great for focusing on shooting and passing. The ball says for ages 8 and under, but I think a bit older could use it to (as the adults here are having just as much fun with it!).
customer_reviews.author: Kat S

customer_reviews.title: Gets lopsided easily
customer_reviews.text: The ball is cheap feeling. Gets lopsided easily. Pay $7 more and get the next best product. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: xroosterx

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for kids.
customer_reviews.text: A yes, the bang, bang, bang of the basketball heralding a small boy is growing up. This is a very good ball for a large fie-year-old. Fits his hands but not too small, sturdy, retains air and colourful for finding in the bushes. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: SouthernTransplant

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift
customer_reviews.text: I love that this ball has different colors. My son loves it even more
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lazzerini

customer_reviews.title: This ball is okay. We bought several at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is okay. We bought several at the time. This one loses air a little faster. It doesn't bounce or spring back up as quickly as the Spaulding NBA street basketball.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: I will use these from now on best I have Had
customer_reviews.text: I will use these from now on best I have Had
customer_reviews.author: Michael Benninger

customer_reviews.title: 4-year-old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old son's favourite birthday present. The weight is perfect... He loves that he can sometimes make a basket even on a standard hoop.
customer_reviews.author: thenoteshed

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Bounce
customer_reviews.text: This ball doesn’t bounce like a normal basketball. It makes dribbling ten times more difficult, especially for the “rookie” for whom this was designed.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball for daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old who was playing in a league for the first time. She absolutely loves this ball! It has been perfect both indoor and out, and has held air very well. It also has a much softer feel to it, which seems strange for a basketball, but hey, it is geared towards a girl so maybe they know what they are doing. Anyway, I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a ball for a young girl. It makes her want to play more!
customer_reviews.author: ddstsm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: Perfect basketball for our little guy. It’s quality is great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent youth basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality youth basketball. Not a toy. A good choice for young players.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Solid basketball for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few years ago, and it's still intact and working. Colours have faded a bit, though.
customer_reviews.author: M Cheers

customer_reviews.title: Second Spaulding synthetic ball I've bought neither have any bounce ...
customer_reviews.text: Second Spaulding synthetic ball I've bought neither have any bounce to them at all even fully inflated. Hard for a kid to learn to dribble when the ball has no bounce to it. I'd reccomend buying the rubber one it does bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Clotacin Company

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and did help my kids get the ball over ...
customer_reviews.text: It is lighter in weight as advertised, but also causes a slight "hollow" feel when dribbling. I would recommend and did help my kids get the ball over a 10ft rim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball and very colorful
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball and very colorful. Got it for my 4 year old who is starting to play basketball. Haven't tested it outdoors any, but it has a good feel to it. Great for younger kids who don't want an ordinary plain basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but that's about it. It's small, doesn't bounce well, not even if you attempt to add more air
customer_reviews.author: Mary Washington

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball if it held air for more than a couple days.
customer_reviews.text: Ball is nice but will not stay inflated after a day or two. Must be something wrong with the inflation bead?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Youth Basketball
customer_reviews.text: This youth basketball was purchased for my daughter. What we really liked about this colorful basketball is that when the whole team was shooting or at the end of practice, her basketball was easy to spot and retrieve.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Looked very good quality and I hope 7-year old who asked for ...
customer_reviews.text: Requested in child's letter submitted through charitable Christmas gift program. Looked very good quality and I hope 7-year old who asked for it likes it!
customer_reviews.author: MMLELL

customer_reviews.title: The ball would not stay inflated for more than 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball would not stay inflated for more than 12 hours. I had to pump it up every day I had it. I am returning it and asking for a replacement, hoping that it was a defective ball and not a defective product in general. I'll write a review for the second basketball.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute ball!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball at a great price! My daughter needed a 27.5 basketball but indoor/outdoor ones were not easy to find at the store. Instead of driving around even more, I looked on amazon and found this! She loves it for basketball practice and the colors are so super cute! It makes her ball stand out and really easy to find at practice amongst all the other balls. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: HAS COME VERY VERY CREASED AND WE WERE NOT ABLE ...
customer_reviews.text: HAS COME VERY VERY CREASED AND WE WERE NOT ABLE TO CORRECT IT EVEN WITH AIR FLATION
customer_reviews.author: tato

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: Too light. The material is cheap. It bouces wierd, so my son can really use it to imorove on dribbling or shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, perfect for my 5 year old playing basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor ball
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball, great quality, I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: 3ptman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for young boy. Nice small size, leather basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great feel to the skin - May not last long
customer_reviews.text: Great feel to the skin, perfect weight for my 6, now 7 yo son. He loves playing with it almost daily. Update - 2016 May: The ball's surface has started to peel off. Expected a longer life for a ball labeled Indoor/Outdoor Composite.
customer_reviews.author: bSmart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my almost four year old! They had these balls on his basketball team so I got the same one and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I still had to put in air l. Have an air pump on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jamita

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. I coach own 5. Really light for the younger kids to work on proper form and handle the ball.
customer_reviews.author: The Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning by the youngsters
customer_reviews.text: Great for the younger kids whose hands are small but want to play basketball
customer_reviews.author: Maureen E Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift for a granddaughter. It looks great and has a great texture.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It's a great ball, but luckily I have a little girl ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wished I checked the measurements before I bought this. It's a great ball, but luckily I have a little girl that can use this item.
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and younger players
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball. Its lite too so great for beginners. Great inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sorensen

product_meta.title: Spalding Rookie Gear Indoor/Outdoor Composite 27.5 Youth Basketball
product_meta.description: Help your young athlete sharpen up their skills. The Spalding NBA Rookie Gear Youth Basketball is the same size as standard youth balls, but with a lighter weight. It's made with a composite cover that holds up to drills both indoors and out
feature_bullets: Designed for indoor and outdoor play
